Uses of Interface
squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.constraints.ILayoutConstraints

  • Packages that use ILayoutConstraints 
    Package Description
    squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.constraints  
    squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.generators  

    • Uses of ILayoutConstraints in squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.constraints

      Classes in squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.constraints that implement ILayoutConstraints 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CountConstraints
      Limits the ILayoutGenerator in the number of keys, switches and rooms it is allowed to place.
      class  FreeformConstraints 
      class  SpaceConstraints
      Constrains the coordinates where Rooms may be placed to be only those within the SpaceMap, as well as placing limitations on the number of keys and switches.

    • Uses of ILayoutConstraints in squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.generators

      Fields in squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.generators declared as ILayoutConstraints 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ILayoutConstraints LayoutGenerator.constraints 
      Constructors in squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.generators with parameters of type ILayoutConstraints 
      Constructor and Description
      LayoutGenerator(IRNG rng, ILayoutConstraints constraints)
      Creates a LayoutGenerator with a given random seed and places specific constraints on IRoomLayouts it generates.
